title: How do you change that text?
body:
http://prntscr.com/6fd56d

Where it says your division, this person isn't actually challenger as I checked and I've seen that part changed before, how do you do it?

replies.body:
If I recall right, it's an alternative client.
Before you ask, the client is illegal to use as it breaks various things in the ToS.

I think that is incorrect.

fluorescent taco is bronze 7 with 9001 wins i think. lol

> [{quoted}](name=Officer Caitlyn,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uefKPjGh,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2015-03-12T01:03:46.576+0000)
>
> I think that is incorrect.
> 
> fluorescent taco is bronze 7 with 9001 wins i think. lol

That's because theirs a client that allows you to change it and it reflects visually. Lol.
By getting good at the game, and winning enough ranked games to be able to get to challenger.

he said the person isnt even really challenger...ive seen it a few times too. its almost always a silver/gold player really. and not in ranked teams or if they are its bronze/silver ranked teams at best.
